name: zettellink-obsidian-plugin
description: Guide Obsidian users towards fundamental Zettelkasten principles through subtle assistance

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && mkdir -p dist && cp styles.css dist/styles.css && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.release: npm run build && export VER=$(node get-version.mjs) && git add dist/main.js dist/styles.css dist/manifest.json && git commit -m 'Release: $VER' && git tag $VER && git push origin main && git push origin $VER
scripts.release:gh: npm run build && export VER=$(node get-version.mjs) && git add dist/main.js dist/styles.css dist/manifest.json && git commit -m 'Release: $VER' && git tag $VER && git push origin main && git push origin $VER && gh release create $VER dist/main.js dist/styles.css dist/manifest.json --title 'ZettelLink $VER' --notes 'Release $VER for Obsidian.'

author: Leo
